title: It seems Dr. Mundo has special abilities/perception
body:
In the story, it says 
> He [Ekko] repeated himself over and over again (perhaps suffering from a case of physical amnesia?)

and 

> But then – somehow – the treatment reversed itself. Whatever good Mundo had accomplished in his last attempt at a cure was suddenly undone. To Mundo’s utter confusion, the child scurried away, utterly uncured. 

But I'm pretty sure that people aside from Ekko don't percieve him reversing time, only the final result. In the Chronbreak comic, the wounded guy keeps saying the same things, the whistling man expresses no confusion. Same thing in Ekko's story with his parents. And I'm pretty sure that in the Ekko Q&A, Rioters confirmed that.

So how does Mundo understand what's happening? Special senses, a mistake on the writer's part, what?

replies.body: Mundo observes the flow of time as he pleases.

As expected of the mighty Mundo.

Now we need Doctor Mundo where he's a timelord.
Who needs a cleaver when you have a screwdriver.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YEAjsAq7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-31T22:18:11.849+0000)
>
> Mundo observes the flow of time as he pleases.

Every time this question has cropped up it's received a similar answer. It was mildly amusing the first few times I saw entirely different Rioters give the response, but considering this is a hook I would actually love to see explored, I'm beginning to feel disappointed when this question is repeatedly met with "Mundo because he is Mundo". I know this is not done with any malice in heart, I just wish we could see something reminiscent of a real response, perhaps a "Mundo's story in relation to his ability to perceive the manipulation of time shall be explained as he pleases". Apologies if this comes across as crass, merely wanted to express my woes as they were.
Mundo might have a case of super sanity.

There is a theory that says Mundo could've been born in Icathia and affected by the Void, which would explain him being able to understand that Ekko is messing with time and easily grasp upon the idea:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/zEHiQiLm-i-just-realized-just-what-dr-mundo-is

I'm usually not a fan of those "THEY'RE FROM THE VOID/A DARKIN", but this one would actually be a unique and interesting direction for a Zaunite character.
